item.title: German parliament to vote on historic debt reform
item.description: The reforms include changes to the debt brake rule and the creation of an infrastructure fund.

item.title: Trump revokes secret service protection for Biden's children Hunter and Ashley
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump on Monday revoked secret service protection for former president Joe Biden's children Hunter Biden and Ashley Biden.

item.title: Trump nominates Republic Airways CEO Bryan Bedford as US FAA head
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump nominated Republic Airways CEO Bryan Bedford as the administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration, he said on socia...

item.title: DOJ seeks to boot judge questioning Trump deportations, lawyer warns of 'constitutional crisis'
item.description: The Trump administration has used the wartime Alien Enemies Act to deport hundreds of alleged Venezuelan gang members to Central America.

item.title: Oil rises as Trump says Iran will be held responsible for any future Houthi attacks
item.description: Houthi strikes have forced international shipping companies to re-route container ships that would normally pass through the Red Sea and Suez Canal.
